scripts.finish: npm run hastests -s && echo 'Checking dependencies...' && npm run outdateddeps -s && npm run auditdeps -s && echo 'Linting...' && npm run lint -s && echo 'Scanning for issues...' && npm run scan -s && echo 'Running tests...' && npm run test -s && npm run askversion -s && echo 'Steps remaining: 1) commit final changes, 2) switch to `main` branch, 3) merge feature branch into `main`'
scripts.hastests: echo 'Ensure there are tests for the paths users are most likely to encounter. Press any key to continue or CTRL+C to cancel.' && read -p '' dummy && exit 0
scripts.outdateddeps: npm outdated --color=always | tee /tmp/outdated.txt && if [ -s /tmp/outdated.txt ]; then echo 'If any red packages, CTRL+C and `npm update --save PACKAGENAME`. Otherwise, press any key to continue.' && read -p '' dummy; fi
scripts.check: npm run outdateddeps && npm run lint && npm run scan
scripts.scan: npm run depcruiser -s && svelte-check 1> /dev/null 2>&2 && npm run knip -s -- --no-progress
scripts.askversion: bash -c 'read -p "Choose version bump (0=patch, 1=minor, 2=major) or press any key to continue..." choice; case $choice in 0) npm run version:patch;; 1) npm run version:minor;; 2) npm run version:major;; *) echo "Skipping version bump." && exit 0;; esac'
